values:
things i still have to pack before i leave for england:
  • EVERYTHING



but instead i'm having drinks and trawling through the "tom hiddleston has a wife/serious girlfriend" post on ONTD... pure gold. that the actor who plays loki is such a magnificent troll is just icing on the nordic cake.

you have no idea how much it warms my heart to see cesc fabregas and gerard pique trolling the hell out of puyol for what he wore to the UEFA gala. 

hearts in my eyes over how cesc has fit in with the team.

Baseball. I'm sorry we've been separated for so long. I'LL NEVER LEAVE YOU AGAIN. (Except when I'm abroad? We can work things out.)


EDIT: Also, we, uh, we bought Cesc Fabregas? We bought Cesc Fabregas.
You cannot be serious that there is another Clasico so soon. I AM NOT READY FOR THIS.

you have no idea how much i love the fact that the alternate ending to "the eagle" is basically marcus and esca walking off into the sunset side by side with a plan to move to spain and raise horses together. 

subtext, what is it?

so i was at the sox game last night. kinda lackluster aside from a few valiant attempts to start the wave from the section next to me and the fact that at an inning break they played "sexy bitch" over the loudspeaker. also, our "one pitcher, one batter" strategy was interesting.

and i have never heard the name saltalamacchia before except in an episode of "psych", where shawn refers to gus as his associate, hummingbird saltalamacchia.

i'm going to denmark for a week! ttyl. 

p.s. - barca, don't buy cesc while i'm gone. and DON'T SELL BOJAN.

you know, every time i start to think, man whatever, it seems like the cesc thing only matters to the fans, the players are over it, cesc and gerard have twitter fights about who won a billiards game. oh, boys.

Madrid, Valencia, Barcelona, Madrid -- as long as the snow stays out of the way.

EDIT: As you can imagine, shit got real. Rerouted to Rome.

I have been up for like 36 hours working on this stupid paper, and it's almost done but that just means I should be powering through. What I most definitely should NOT be doing is google-translating the EPIC TWITTER WAR going on between Gerard Pique, Cesc Fabregas, and Carles Puyol.

They're having a competition to see whose Christmas tree is nicer, although most people agree that Pique should stop making excuses and post his damn tree already. He claims that it's an unfair competition because he doesn't have a girlfriend to help.

JUST SAY THE WORD, PIQUE, AND I'M THERE. Got your back in the girlfriend department, buddy, you know that.



Cesc and his ridic little dog for your time.








And also some bonus bromance because I WILL NEVER GET ENOUGH OF THEM.

Just to note, as it pertains to the Spanish national football team doping scandal, "blood doping" is waaaaay different from "steroids" and does not cause weight gain or muscle mass. 

<lj-cut text="elaboration under cut">
Blood doping occurs when a doctor takes blood, usually a few weeks before competition, and processes it so that only the red blood cells remain. The athlete keeps training like everything is normal. Then, hours or even minutes before competition, the doctor injects that highly-oxygenated blood back into the athlete. This causes a vastly increased capacity to carry oxygen through the bloodstream and to muscles, and the athlete experiences a huge burst of energy. 

In short, you wouldn't really notice, per say. Blood doping is not like steroids, but it's still cheating. At the same time, we've seen this whole show before in baseball and it was pretty sucky and yet no surprise, so.

</lj-cut>

Gerard Piqué joining Twitter is turning out just as perfectly as I had hoped.

His tweets are in Catalan, if you're going to Google translate. Just know that the auto-detect language button has trouble distinguishing between Catalan and Spanish.

Basically, he, Cesc Fabregas, and Carles Puyol (WHO HAVE BEEN BEST FRIENDS SINCE THEY WERE JUST LITTLE CULÉS AND WENT TO BOARDING SCHOOL TOGETHER OMG) just tweet each other like massive dorks and call each other out on the internet about ridiculous things. Like Puyol having Piqué over for lunch and not serving good food, and then Cesc complains that he wasn't invited even though he lives in London, and then that the last time he slept over at Puyi's house there was no food and no furniture.

Basically they have brought their shenangians to the internet so that we may all enjoy! And people are taking bets on how long before Piqué gets drunk and tweets about his undying love for Cesc. I VOTE MINUTES.



Puyol, Fabregas, Piqué - bros being bros

So, World Cup! is over. And club football doesn't begin for a few weeks. But I made icons!



        
       



And for Americans interested in watching club matches, ESPN3 (espn3.com) carries a lot of them, depending on which internet provider you have. :)

So there's this kid, right? Named Manuel Neuer, and he's the keeper for the German national team. He went from last on the list to our #1 goalie when Rene Adler got hurt, and did AMAZING at the World Cup.





Just look at his adorable face! And he seems like a grounded, good kid, and took it really well when his childhood hero Jens Lehmann said that Germany couldn't count on him. That's gotta hurt, but he handled it so classy and ♥ ♥ ♥! Fans call him "Duckie" and no one wants to say that they know quite why, but I suspect it's because his goalie uniform is all BRIGHT YELLOW AND WILL GIVE YOU EYE STRAIN... and that yeah, in the right light he maybe looks like a duck.



And idk but I am SO ATTRACTED TO HIM. See below for reasons:



PS He's wobbling like that because he's on an exercise bike lol


gifs taken from loewsmiserables

This whole post is basically an excuse for a few pictures and a totally inexplicable video.















I think most of these came from tumblr?




And 10 points to anyone who tells me what the hell is going on here:


Excuse the Benny Hill music, and almost-creepy slowmo replay.



The thing I love the most about this one is the way they translate his last name in the theme song. "Fernando... TOWERS!"


In this one he says something about not being able to properly pronounce "Pepsi" because of where he's from (which is a suburb of Madrid? as far as I know) and it's given him an accent, but I'm not sure about that?




Fernando Torres walking around half-naked FYT.

Err, I don't really have an explanation for these videos, except that they might be for Prinz cookies and might make your head explode.


But lemme tell you, I am very disappointed in any world in which it is NOT true that Poldi spends his off-time harassing patrons of parks across Cologne! I choose to believe that this is more of a documentary than a commercial, and everyone lives in fear of the man in the red sweater who mildly inconveniences you during your workout. 



<center>
<lj-embed id="57"/>



<lj-embed id="58"/>
</center>

Some Nationalmannschaft gifs to round out the World Cup season, in no particular order. Plus, a few ~relevant pictures. Schweinski, to begin! Many feared that Bastian and Poldi weren't going to be as public with their affections, as they're really trying to show that they're great individually and not just together. But never fear. Bastian got the nod as vice-captain and he did a lot to encourage and motivate everyone, including Lukas. Yeah, bb, that's how I felt about the semifinals, too. After the 3rd place victory, Bastian Schweinsteiger took off his shirt to trade it, as they do, and was still wearing his captain's armband and GUH SCHWEINI Speaking of Oezil... I love the bromance he has developed with Poldi! They're so sweet! POLISHBROS DO NOT APPROVE aka Miroslav you better come to Euro12 and Brazil14 or I will FIND YOU Bastian Schweinsteiger and Philipp Lahm of the NT and Bayern Munich get to drive a new Audi, remain gorgeous and classy while doing so. Lastly, our amazing and super cute goalkeeper, Manuel Neuer! Manuel Neuer smooching some dude for your time.

So, the World Cup. My feelings are mixed. Germany was so strong, and I was so surprised and disappointed when they crashed out of the semi-finals to an overall inferior Spain. But, what's over is over. Tomorrow they play Uruguay for third place, and on Sunday Spain plays Netherlands for the championship. Paul the Octopus, in perhaps a last-minute bid to avoid being cooked and lightly seasoned, has predicted Germany in the 3rd place game and Spain in the finals. The Mannschaft has said that they don't want to have a public celebration, like they did in 2006, and while I'm disappointed, I respect their choice. Judging by the way they played at the beginning of the WC, I expected them to win the championship. I guess they did, too, and celebrating an at-best 3rd place finish doesn't seem exciting when facing what could have been. But at the same time, I hope they understand how proud their fans are of them, and recognize just how far they've gotten. There were plenty of also-rans in this tournament, and Germany wasn't one of them. So, a happy spam!
Just a final roundup of pics scavanged from Tumblr and ontd_fb, etc. I didn't have the heart to read through any of the consolation posts, though, so I might have missed some real gems. Lemme know! I ALWAYS BEGIN WITH POLDI. Maybe he's not the best club player, but.... what was the question? This pic pretty much sums up my feelings about this team. Yeah, Poldi. My thoughts exactly. Poldi and Miro in a general pile-on-Oezil moment. (And fun fact: I spell his and Mueller's names differently because I CANNOT figure out how to add umlats on my PC. Umlats on Macbooks only.) Also, I really hope I have made my love of Mesut Oezil clear, because, YES. So young! So full of potential! He has so many goals and bromances to look forwards to on this team. ♥ There's something about his legs, idk... I can't stop watching this gif. I really like the black away jerseys, but those strips of shiny plastic or whatever across the back make it look like they're wearing sports bras. ;) No post is complete without Schweinski! There was a time, a while ago, when they both came out against the idea of Schweinski, saying that the press had come up with it and they had been told to keep it going because it was good publicity. Schweini made a big deal about being his own man. But no one can stop a mancrush this strong, and of course they still hang out and do high fives and ridiculous things. Boys! ♥ ♥ ♥ Bastian and Per dancing! THIS WILL NEVER NOT MAKE ME SMILE. Speaking of Bastian... Miro and Lahmi and Mueller! I WANT A COUPLE FOR MYSELF. More Lahm. Note: that is a normal-sized glass of bier. Lahm is just THAT small. A really close closeup of Neuer, aka my favorite goalie!
Poldi and Per thank you for your time.

The fellowship of the vuvuzela! aka a Lord of the Rings/World Cup crossover (did your brain just explode?) that serves as an accurate metaphor for just how annoying vuvuzelas are. I don't want them at the games; they distract the players and drown out the songs and chants that are so much a part of the clubs' football tradition. BUT I WANT THEM EVERYWHERE ELSE. I WANT A VUVUZELA TO DEPLOY IN EVERYDAY SITUATIONS.

I am saddened, both by the number of outstanding young men and women who have died for this country and for what it is and could be, and by the number of our citizens who will never know or care what Memorial Day means.

saturday night plans: get drunk, eat cake, watch nascar.

MISSION. ACCOMPLISHED.

there's definitely a f'real machine in my campus's marketplace, and today i did a little recon under the guise of buying diet coke. 

i have spotted the machine and am anticipating the day i have about 600 calories to play with.

so idk what to do now. I'm locked down in the dining hall because an armed gunman robbed a bank near campus and now he's loose. He's already shot someone. 

I didn't know that my town had a SWAT team but apparently. They're searching the library. 

Point is, I have nothing to do and I hope my iPod doesn't run out of battery.

so, as a general rule, i find Simon Pegg to be cute but not super attractive.

HOT FUZZ HAS JUST SHOT THIS RULE IN THE FACE.

wow. i have quite a thing for cops, and apparently quite a thing for snarky british blondes dressed as cops.

more later, when coherency returns.
today: paranormal state marathon, beef stew, xmas decorations, rum and cokes.
turkey bacon and chardonnay are not as great a combination as you might initially suspect.
ugh i need to be putting my shit in the car and then getting my ass to Toronto, but they started a party post on and it's fucking distracting.

ugh i was supposed to be working out, but quinto > plyometrics, honestly. so here we go! sylar's first appearance in season 2! so, for those qgmfs who don't know, Heroes Season 1 ended with a big battle in the center of an industrial park, possibly in Texas. Why no one / the authorities failed to notice this is never explained. Anyway, Hiro (who along with Ando and Mohinder and Matt Parkman form the base of likable characters in this show) stabs Sylar with a sword and Nathan Petrelli carries an about to explode (yeah no i'm not making this up) Peter Petrelli into the skys where they supernova. OR DO THEY? Anyway, battered but alive the other characters leave Sylar for dead. BIG MISTAKE.
Welcome to Maui.
This is Michelle, although last season her name was Candice. She's a shape shifter and illusion maker and she likes daquaris and talking on the phone. And also nursing insane serial killers back to life. Sylar doesn't know what's going on and doesn't know who she is. She makes really no effort to explain. She tells him that it's an illusion, and he demands to see reality. She says that he won't like it, and he gets rough, and then i start to like it and everything spirals out of control. But she's totally right. He doesn't like reality. He wants answers! But she offers daquaris. Delicious looking daquaris. WITH THOSE TINY UMBRELLAS. Michelle/Candice tells him not to move, because it will open his stitches again. Sylar notices that he doesn't actually have stitches, and that's when she mentions that, oh hey yeah, she controls reality. If you can't tell from this cap that Sylar's planning something evil that involves a certain amount of her brain matter soon making a home outside her skull, you clearly have never seen an episode of HEROES. So like i said, he gets rough and she shows him reality and IT'S REALLY UNPLEASANT IN A SORT OF SEEDY, TRAVELING-BUSINESSMAN-IN-TUB-OF-ICE, ORGAN HARVESTING SORT OF WAY. Yeah bb the rumors are true; you're in a tin shed in a rainforest in South/Central America. There are zero levels of sterility, a plywood shelf full of medical supplies, and someone spilled vodka sauce all over Sylar's wound (although i'm willing to believe that they meant it to be iodine). Michelle says that his back wound has totally healed and they're only worried about the front, never really mentioning who she works for. But the gist is that she's not here out of some fondness for rescuing stabees in city squares and kidnapping them to rural Honduras. You see this cup? SYLAR CAN'T FUCKIN MOVE THIS CUP. HE IS NOT HAVING A NICE DAY GODDAM. This is his pissy face. Michelle made him breakfast but he's only interested in BRAIIINS. All his plans are coming undone! but michelle assures him that with her help, he can get all his powers back. If you haven't figured out that she's working for The Company, well, you need to start doing the reading, jesus. She's getting a little sick of his bitchiness, we can tell. He's like, how the hell could YOU help? and she tells him that she can make the process EASY. yeah, like that. What's his fantasy? TWINS? haha AMATEUR. clearly, it's himself, which michelle picks up on almost immediately. whatevs, if i looked like that i'd want to fuck me, too. NOTICE HOW HE DOESN'T DENY IT. More sneering, more mockery of her egg-making process. BUT AN EVIL PLAN IS FORMING. maybe she can help, sweetheart, maybe she can. make it hurt so good. Sylar: Maybe I underestimated you. You are extra-ordinary... just. like. me. And then he smashes her with the 'nice day' cup. And then he eats her! what were you expecting? But something's wrong! he doesn't have her powers! and now that she's dead, he's got sort of a problem on his hands. I'd also like to open a discussion about how females are only on this show to be raped, about to be raped, or fridged. I usually don't care, you guys, I NEVER react to that feminist reaction like on spn but this is OVERT. painfully overt. bb realizes that he's fucked. it's a good look but one that Sylar doesn't wear too often. so, yeah, he's stuck in the middle of nowhere and still has a pretty serious open wound that probably requires some sterilization and maybe an actual doctor. and without his powers, but at least this means The Company is watching.
Anyway, next time will be a spam and discussion of Mohinder Suresh and Matt Parkman, a professor and a cop who live together in a tiny NY apartment and raise a daughter together. The Story of Suresh and Parkman, or, Molly Has Two Daddies.

I don't even have caps of the best parts of the season, but I'm just going to have to accept that I don't have motivation for that right now, and instead spam you with what I have.

MOSTLY THAT GQMF ZQ BUT A HEALTHY PORTION OF MILO.

ALSO, SOME BLOOD, YOU GUYS, SO DON'T BE SQUEAMISH.





Let's start with Milo, aka Peter Petrelli. He's had his memory wiped and his shirt removed and some thugs have found him in a shipping container in Cork, Ireland, that was supposed to be full of ipods. 1000 ipods. Why they had a shipping container the size of a city block for a thousand ipods is never explained.




They throw water on him to wake him up in a very Midnight Express-esque interrogation scene.




He also spits out an unrealistic and unhealthy amount of blood.










Not that I approve of torture, BUT I APPROVE OF THIS SCENE. WHY ISN'T MY JOB TO BE THE PERSON WHO OILS UP THE HEROES CAST MEMBERS?










Peter is a little resentful, and a lot confused. He doesn't know who he is! He doesn't know where those ipods are! He doesn't know why he's covered in fake blood and baby oil!







The sister of the leader of the thugs comes in to wash him in a totally unnecessary, personal-space invading way. Seriously, handwashing his wounds from a porcelain tub? Is this James Joyce?




Anyway, they discover that he has healing powers! All his wounds are gone.




NOW TO SYLAR. IMO THIS MOMENT HAS BEEN TOO LONG IN COMING.
I actually don't have caps of his very first appearance in season 2, but they will get their own post because it's a pretty awesome moment.

This is Sylar, Maya, and her brother... Bernard, or Alejandro or something. IDK, he doesn't have powers and yells a lot, he's just support for Maya. Anyway, Sylar's lost his powers after Hiro killed him at the end of season 1. Maya and Bernard are on the run after Maya caught Bernard's wife and best man doing the horizontal tango at their wedding reception and accidentally killed EVERYONE AT THE WEDDING, WHICH SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN THE ENTIRE TOWN. Needless to say, they're on the run from the police. They think that going to New York to Dr. Suresh, who Sylar has killed and eaten but he doesn't mention that, will help Maya control her powers.












Bernard doesn't trust Sylar, but Maya does. This leads to a lot of friction, and also a lot of Sylar smirking. Especially because only Maya speaks English, so when they're alone Sylar likes to tell Bernard how good it will feel to kill him and then eat his sister.

Most awkward road trip ever.

Also, they're crossing borders illegally because the police are after them for some pretty outrageous murders and shit seems to happen in every town they stop in. They find Sylar by the side of the road and agree to help him.














This is when they find him. Maya wants to help, Bernard wants to throw him out of the car, and the college kid who stole the car they're driving doesn't really care.







He should, though, because Sylar takes a brick and bashes his skull in when the kid confides in him that he's seen the wanted posters for Bernard and Maya and is concerned they're riding with mass murderers. Sylar tells him to call the police and then follows him into the back alley and does what he does best.



He confronts the twins and they admit it's them, but that Maya never meant to hurt anyone. Maya freaks out and her eyes bleed death (I'm not joking, she CRIES TEARS OF DEATH) and almost kills Sylar but he's really impressed. The seed plants in his mind that if he can convince Maya that she doesn't need Bernard to stop her killing spree, as she always has, then he can get her alone and steal her powers.







Maya: What is your name?
Sylar: Gabriel. Gabriel Grey.
Maya: Gabriel. Like the angel!
Sylar: Yeah... just like the angel.

Ugh, I want to Heroes-spam you guys SO MUCH but the capping software isn't working! WHY NOT? I really can't figure this out. It let me take maaaany caps from DOOM.

Maybe it doesn't think Sylar is as delicious as Karl Urban? I HOPE NOT I WOULD HAVE TO DELETE IT IF IT DID.

Let's talk about "DOOM." I watched the movie so you don't have to, friends, and I would like to present my findings.
DON'T LOOK SO SKEPTICAL, BB.
We're going to begin in the most unlikely Marines barracks ever, where Karl (playing the character John "Reaper" Grimm, harhar aren't these boys funny? And original? I didn't get a cap of it but Karl rolls his eyes about the nickname, too, when asked.) is DEFINATELY NOT SMELLING WHAT THE ROCK IS COOKING. STAY BEHIND ON THIS MISSION, WHUT? "What, you think just because we're following a distress call to the very institution on which my parents died, brutally altering my childhood and alienating my from my one remaining relative, my sister, is going to affect my combat readiness? Psh, please." Their weapons are tied to "handle identification," which I have to assume is some measure of handle grip and fingerprint identification, but the specifics escape me. Anyway, here's Reapers, because he's not going to stay behind on this one, no matter what The Rock Sarge says. Riding in the special "rapid response tactical" helicopter, which is really just a regular helicopter with a flatscreen TV. I'm not joking. THE ROCK IS TRYING TO EMOTIONALLY COMPROMISE HIM BUT REAPER IS HAVING NONE OF THAT BULLSHIT.

If you think this is ominous foreshadowing and a callback to the fact that the video game the movie is based on actually involves a descent into Hell and not a Mars-based research facility, you are refreshingly correct.

At this point in the film, and I use this term loosely, the entire squad forms up in a V formation and poses for many seconds on what, upon first viewing, seems to be a park lawn. Later an elevator comes up from the ground. They're getting ready to go through "The Ark," which the game tells us is something that archeologists discovered left over from a previously unknown civilization and conveniently located only a few minutes from downtown Las Vegas. Why they never discovered it until whatever century this takes place in will remain a mystery for the rest of the film. Apparently The Ark makes you vomit up every meal you've ever eaten, but you better believe that our GQMF Karl goes first and totally manages to keep everything in his stomach that belongs there. This is his face when he meets his sister. Awwwkwaaard. Especially when one of his teammates repeatedly insists on talking about banging her. First, of course, he asks if Karl has 'tapped that' and why he 'let that fine piece of ass get away' to which Karl responds, "She's my sister." THEY'RE TWINS. IF I WERE KARL, I WOULD SLEEP WITH ONE EYE OPEN AROUND THE GUY WHO WANTS TO FUCK SOMEONE WHO LOOKS VERY MUCH LIKE ME. Here he is observing a skeleton that they found, of a creature named "Lucy" (producers have been watching a lot of National Geographic Channel, huh?) that was apparently super strong and super smart but still really dead. FORESHADOWING. Needless to say, some prehistoric virus (that gives you a 24th chromosome that either makes you a Predator-esque monster with killin' on the brain or a superhuman with powers we're only told about but they're there, okay guys, just trust us) gets out and infects or eats everyone. He gets shot with his own weapon and is bleeding, so naturally his sister, who has seen the havoc that his extra chromosome (apparently you can just INJECT chromosomes, by the way, and they'll alter your genes on the spot) has wrought and decides to inject her brother and maybe save his life. Reaper begs her not to, because he's done horrible things and will probably turn into a monster, too, but she's pretty confident and injects him because he's too weak to fight her, like some sort of futuristic interplanetary Doctor Kavorkian. BUT IT TURNS OUT HE WAKES UP AS A GOOD GUY. And he's going to fight The Rock, who was bitten by the monsters and turns out bad. Sarge: You gonna shoot me? Reaper: I was thinkin' about it, yeah. But he only has half a clip! The Rock only has one round! THAT MEANS IT'S TIME FOR SOME HAND TO HAND, BITCHES. That's Karl dropping his belt, as The Rock leaps on him like an angry squirrel. SPOILERS: KARL WINS GODDAM YOU CANNOT JUST TRY TO EAT HIS TWIN SISTER AND GET AWAY NO MATTER HOW MANY WWE TITLES YOU HOLD. WHEN WILL BITCHES LEARN?

It has come to my attention, mostly through  party posts, that I'm just going to have to rent every one of Karl Urban's movies on the off-chance he's universe-ending kinds of hot in it. Apparently, it happens with alarming regularity, especially in movies you would not expect. (Chronicles of Riddick, what?)

Sometimes, I think, "Eh, Karl Urban's pretty cool, but he's nothing exciting to look at."

And then he makes me seem so wrong it's like I'm on my way to an exciting new career being wrong.




It's like I just earned my degree in being wrong from the Honors Program at Wrong University.

Thanks to  I now will not rest until I have seen "Anton and Jon Go To White Castle."


WHY HASN'T IT HAPPENED?

THERE IS NO GODDAMN NIGHT TIME IN SPACE. IT IS ALWAYS DARK.






YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE.

There's a boy in my literature class. He's beautiful and smells of peaches.



I might love him.

Spring Break: got my dogtags, got the flu, was a poetry competition finalist, and now I'm in Florida. With all the old people. And I missed breakfast. 

But if i stayed in the northeast for one more second I was going to lose my cool. On the downside, I went right from school to the south, and I'll be going right back without stopping at home. :(


I smell sunblock.
So, watching Batman: the Animated Series =/= doing homework. :( This saddens me deeply, as does the lack of Flash-centric JLU episodes. Somebody, send help. Or Wally West.
I really wish I been paying attention to the color of the Batman fruit snacks I've been eating, because that last one was delicious. But also maybe because they're Batman themed. Batman, jesus.

PT today was awesome. At first is sucked, but then we started picking cherries, and not everyone could do them. So we did them for longer. And then we had to make airplane noises as we did the windmill things. We did a lap with our hands in the air. The Navy must think we're a bunch of weirdos. Then we played basketball. AWESOME. The stockiest kid got laid flat by our company CO, who is like a 5 ft older woman. 

Then we went to breakfast. Ugh, do not want Calc for 1.5 hrs.

I definitely just read a line in my Bio textbook as "homoerotic" when it was, in fact, "homeotic." That's where you went, Brain. I was wondering.

Stupid PT tomorrow. Fourth day out of five that I'll have to get up at 5 am. Why is this still a good idea?

Watching Saving Private Ryan while you're homesick is a really bad idea. Really bad.

Also, today a great wrong was visited on Bravo Company. I'm looking at you, forgetful flag bearer. B CO does not like to go last for food.

That's what I didn't bring to college! My "Mikey Fuckin' Way" shirt!

Also, PT Friday.

Holy crap I'm at college.

Send help.

PS I'm disappointed to announce that the internet has run out of ways to entertain me. WOE IS THE DAY.

But the Gaslight Anthem has found many ways. How did no one tell me of them? Why did I have to find them myself?

Also, I leave for college in 1 day. :(

Jesus Christ I can't believe Panic is coming to CT (on a tour that stops in very random places) and I'm going to be living in New York. THEY FINALLY RECOGNIZE THE AWESOMENESS OF CT AND I'M NOT THERE. 

And it's on a fucking Tuesday. Lowell on Wednesday. That doesn't work! The closest is Toronto on a Friday. Yeah, 6 hours and a border crossing away.

I think that kid Ryan from Paranormal State looks like a young Dean Winchester. It's just a coincidence that he also hunts ghosts. 

And has a respectable taste in fashion.
I've been playing Halo 3 for three straight hours now. My hands are shaking, my vision is blurry, and I just got a quadruple-kill.
There are bats in the pool at night. Regrettably, no one got my "We can't stop here" reference.
